ygData.subject: Re: Warning about Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lions, gators, griffins (and -ons and -awnes), and I think sand giants (I only lasted 5 hits against one so can t say for sure) can keep up with the sung
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 2 Jun 1999 David.Lynam@... wrote:
>
> a drum. Also Captain Shralok in Kithicor Forest can keep up with the sung
> version of Accelerando.

Lions, gators, griffins (and -ons and -awnes), and I think
sand giants (I only lasted 5 hits against one so can't say for
sure) can keep up with the sung version as well.

> Just curious, has anyone discovered whether or not
> accelerando's speed increases with levels? I am lv 24, and I havent really
> noticed any difference, but then i use the song much every level and i
> couldnt really tell even if there was a difference.

I could've sworn I was moving noticably faster when I reached
L15 or 16. I've been meaning to test this with a low level
bard for a while.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
